name: SpinScout
tag_list: music, blogging, affiliate, itunes, amazonmp3, rdio
overview:
Add targeted affiliate links to your music website with this easy-to-use affiliate management service.

Simple Set-up SpinScout creates a simple string of code for you to add to your website header. SpinScout detects the music contained on all your web pages, and automatically embeds your customized affiliate links.

Target Every Visitor SpinScout affiliate links are geo-targeted to the exact music marketplaces available in your visitor’s home country, and displayed in the visitor’s preferred language.

Custom Styles A fully customizable template system allows ads to be displayed exactly as you’d like… From simple text links to custom buttons that match your website’s style.

Free Instead of charging for the service, visitors clicking on your affiliate ads are redirected through our own affiliate links (no more than) 5% of the time.
